monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Creates a big rock obstacle - Activates ground switches
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Armor Up
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 75% Defense) Applies Barrier & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Attack value.

skills.name: Beating
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Beating Lvl 5
skills.description: 8 x 55% (440%) physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 25% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), gain 8 Charge stacks. (Once per attack)

skills.name: Blessed Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (neutral) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Blessed Strikes Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (neutral) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Brawn over Brains
skills.description: If this Monster would gain Sorcery (Buff), it gains Might (Buff) instead.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Essence
skills.description: Neutral attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Energy Conversion
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party consumes a Charge stack, it is healed by 1% of its Max Health.

skills.name: First Impact
skills.description: Increases the base damage of the first hit of an attack by an additional 40% of Attack (physical) or Magic (magical). (25% for mass attacks)

skills.name: Flurry of Blows
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Forceful Might
skills.description: Unique Aura: Might also makes all attacks ignore 10% of enemy's damage reduction.

skills.name: Godly Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 140% (560%) physical damage (neutral) - Damage is increased by 3% for every Buff on this Monster

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heavy Punch
skills.description: 1 x 225% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 290% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 360% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 450% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Heavy Punch Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 565% physical damage (neutral)

skills.name: Improved Assault
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 3% increased damage for each Might, Sorcery and Glory Buff on them.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: King of Beasts
skills.description: Aura: Increases this Monster's damage by 5% for each Beast in the party. All Debuffs are 15% less effective on Beasts in your party.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Mana Generator
skills.description: Regenerate 4 Mana for every hit this Monster receives.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Observe
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, shield all Monsters in the party by 50% of this Monster's defense.

skills.name: Power
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Power Focus
skills.description: Shield self for 4 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 15% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield self for 5 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 18% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield self for 6 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 20% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield self for 7 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 22% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Focus Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield self for 8 x (50 + 20% Attack) Increases the damage of the next attack by 25% for every ally that acted this turn (including self).

skills.name: Power Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Power Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Ram Charge
skills.description: 2 x 155% (310%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Relentless
skills.description: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Severe Hit
skills.description: If a single hit deals more than 20% of the enemy's Max HP (10% against Champions), the enemy is afflicted with Armor Break (Debuff) and a stack of Wound.

skills.name: Sure Strike
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 10% increased Critical Chance and cannot be dodged.

skills.name: Utopia
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.

drops.name: Dumbbell
drops.description: Attack +10 Health +100 - Allows this monster to receive an additional stack of Might + Regeneration (Additional stacks are only half as strong)

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.
